ServicesBannerData.bannerDescription: Feels like a web design agency, helps like a doctor. We listen first, and then serve. Particular Websites combine SEO, Strategy and UX to build high-speed, accessible sites that convert even the most stern audiences.

ServiceAboutInfoData.ServiceSecTitle: Particular Approach to Web Design & Visual Identity.
ServiceAboutInfoData.ServiceSecDesc1: We think of your website like a virtual home for your business. Build a customer journey that’s comfortable, visually appealing and sensible for your intended outcomes for your visitors.
ServiceAboutInfoData.ServiceSecDesc2: Building your web identity to extend your brand. Providing customers with a visually captivating picture of your brand and its offering.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Who owns the website once it is complete? Who has the rights to it?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Once the website project is complete, with both the designs and the fully-functional website approved by you, it is fully-owned by you once all invoices have been paid in full*, as quoted in your project proposal. For projects with regularly payments scheduled for a period of 3 months or more, projects may be complete before payment is made in full. In such instances, the complete website may or will likely be launched so that you are able to proceed with your continued marketing efforts. However, the website will not be fully-owned by you until payment is complete in full. *Paid in full meaning the project quote, excluding any fees proposed for website hosting and maintenance by Particular Agency.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What is the process of website transfer once it’s ready?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Once the website is ready for deployment, we begin the transfer process by first backing up your current site (if applicable). We then upload the new site files to your hosting server, configure any necessary settings, and perform final tests to ensure everything is working as expected. Once everything is confirmed, the new site goes live. We provide you with all credentials and a guide to navigate through your new website.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Are SEO Services included in the web design package?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) services can be included in all website projects but are not included as standard. For Particular clients seeking SEO additions to the project, they should mention this to a member of the Products team during Discovery Calls or other communication with them. This can be over the phone or by email.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How many revisions do I get when Particular are building and designing my website?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: 5 revisions are offered per website project as standard - with 3 during the design phase of the project and the remaining 2 during the development phase.The number of revisions, 5, has been selected through our analysis of our experience developing creative projects with clients. Data suggests that 5 is sufficient for our clients’ ideas to be effectively understood and then designed & built, before undergoing our clients’ final scrutiny that completes the project to the specified scope.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How many revisions do I get when Particular are building and designing my website?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: 5 revisions are offered per website project as standard - with 3 during the design phase of the project and the remaining 2 during the development phase.The number of revisions, 5, has been selected through our analysis of our experience developing creative projects with clients. Data suggests that 5 is sufficient for our clients’ ideas to be effectively understood and then designed & built, before undergoing our clients’ final scrutiny that completes the project to the specified scope.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How long will it take to complete my website project?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: The duration of your website project will vary based on its scope. Project duration typically starts at 3 weeks for the smallest scale projects and can range up to several months for extensive, experience intensive web platforms and apps. We aim to complete most projects within a 4-8 weeks timeline.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What is your website quality assurance process?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Our quality assurance process involves multiple stages including design review, code review, functionality testing, cross-browser and device compatibility testing, and performance optimization checks. We ensure that every website we deliver is up to our standard of excellence.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How often will I be updated about my project?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: At the start, you'll set your communication preference. Our usual scheduled update is once a week. Of course, within this, you may be communicating with your account manager on an ongoing basis.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: At the start, you'll set your communication preference. Our usual scheduled update is once a week. Of course, within this, you may be communicating with your account manager on an ongoing basis.
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We utilize a version control system like GitHub for tracking changes in the website's codebase. This ensures that multiple developers can work on the site simultaneously without conflicts, and it allows us to maintain a history of all changes. In addition, we use local development environments to build and test the site before pushing to staging or live servers. Please note this is for custom code

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Will I be able to speak to my web designer directly?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We will usually schedule them in to attend your first and third revision meetings. This gives you a chance to express directly to the person developing your vision creatively.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch support packages to ensure your website continues to run smoothly. This includes periodic updates, security patches, and troubleshooting any issues that may arise.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Will you host my website once it’s done?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We leave this choice open to our clients. For Particular Agency customers, where may likely have designed and built the website in full, it is a natural progression for us to host and manage the website once complete. You can learn the full details through our Maintenance & Hosting Guide. However, this is not a compulsory action. We prefer for our clients to have the choice so that hosting with us may be a willing action, rather than a term of engagement. The extra freedom of movement can help businesses, smaller ones especially, with their next moves - we respect this entirely.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: If I ‘break’ my website post-launch, is it within my rights to have it resolved by you without charge?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We always strive to ensure our clients are satisfied. If there's an issue resulting from our work, we'll fix it at no additional cost. However, if changes were made post-launch without our guidance and caused the issue, there might be a fee involved for the resolution.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Does Web Maintenance include cookie compliance updates?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Yes, our maintenance package includes updates for cookie compliance to ensure your website adheres to the latest regulations and best practices.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Does my website project include web copy?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Website projects will not include web copy as standard, and Particular Agency’s Product team will ask if assistance with this will be useful for you. If so, this will be included in your proposal offer. Some clients know from start to finish what they would like to say on their website, down to the last letter. Others aren’t so fussed, or would like assistance saying the right things. Both scenarios are fine for the Particular Agency Design team to work with.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What will my website’s site speed be like?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We optimise all our websites for speed by implementing best practices such as image optimisation, minification of scripts, and leveraging browser caching. While the exact site speed can vary based on hosting, content, and user location, we aim for your site to be as fast as possible and score well on speed test tools.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Are there ways that you can ensure my website’s speed is optimal? Do you offer website speed optimisation as a service?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Speed optimisation involves strategic work in the development of your website. Moving towards a website that’s responsive and fast can look like any of the following: Compress Images, Enabling Browser Caching, Minimising HTTP Requests, Using Content Delivery Networks (CDNs), Optimising Code, Reducing Server Response Time, Eliminating Render-Blocking JavaScript, Content Delivery Optimisation, Monitoring Performance, Regularly Updating Software and Implementing SSL Encryption.The above can all be offered as a part of our Web Design & Development service.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: I have another website, but it has bugs or is broken. Can you help fix it?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Absolutely! We offer website troubleshooting and repair services. Just provide us with the details, and we'll assess the issues and provide a plan of action to get your site back up and running.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: I don’t really want to be too involved in the creative process. Can I leave Particular Agency to get on with the work and then show it to me?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: This isn't a problem at all. Please ensure you communicate this preference to your account manager. We're more than happy to handle the creative process and present the work to you once it's ready.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Do I have to complete my website brief in order to get a quote?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: The short answer is, yes. We use your completed website brief, which is designed to gauge the full scope of your project, to then prepare your proposal. Your proposal is the written document confirming Particular Agency’s acceptance of the brief and openness to work on the project. You will need this to complete onboarding.Our full onboarding process is outlined in our Web Development Guide, which is free for you to download here.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How can I track the data on my website?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: We typically integrate Google Analytics or similar tracking tools into the websites we develop. This allows you to monitor website traffic, user behavior, conversion rates, and more. We provide a tutorial on how to navigate and interpret this data, ensuring you're well-equipped to understand your site's performance.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Will my website automatically be optimised for mobile, and include mobile designs?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Bespoke mobile designs can be included in all website projects and you will typically discuss this service in any project proposal you receive from the Particular Product team.Mobile usage accounts for over 55% of all web traffic and is usually most sensible in developing a professional-looking, user-friendly online presence.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What is Figma?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Figma is a collaborative design tool that allows for real-time sharing, editing, and commenting on design files. It's a platform that facilitates seamless communication and collaboration between designers and clients.

ServicesTypoSecData.ServicesTypeSecTitle: Our Web Design and Visual Identity Services

services.title: User Experience (UX) Design Optimisation
services.description: Learn where the friction exists on your website and customer-facing systems, look at how to reduce it and improve on your KPIs, all through providing a more seamless, more intuitive experience for your customers and website users.

services.title: User Interface (UI) Design
services.description: Every detail – both visual and functional – can be designed to work in harmony as part of a system. That means colour schemes that capture attention, imagery that adds that layer of inspiration to your brand and functionality that delivers your message in the perfect tone of voice.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Engineering high-speed sites for every popular CMS, including Wix, Squarespace, Shopify, Webflow, Jimdo, Weebly, Webnode and GoDaddy.

ServicesProcessData.ProcessStepFeaturedDesc: Outline your objectives in as much detail as possible - unrealistic desires and long-term goals included - so that we gain a complete idea of the field you’ll be competing in.

It’s important that you understand exactly why we follow the steps we do and how they’re likely to lead to you succeeding in line with or beyond your KPIs.
